description: An accident on the Downtown Connector in Atlanta spilled toxic chemicalsÂ and fuel and blocked traffic for hours.
title: Atlanta chemical spill jams Downtown Connector traffic
title_page: Photos: Atlanta chemical spill jams Downtown Connector traffic
text:
1 / 7
The Atlanta Journal-Constitution An overturned tractor trailer hauling benzoyl chloride snarled traffic in downtown Atlanta for hours on Monday. John Spink/jspink@ajc.com
2 / 7
A tanker truck crash and chemical spill has northbound lanes of the Downtown Connector closed at 10th Street. JOHN SPINK / JSPINK@AJC.COM
3 / 7
A tanker truck crash and chemical spill has the Downtown Connector closed in both directions at 10th Street. JOHN SPINK / JSPINK@AJC.COM
4 / 7
A tanker truck crash and chemical spill has the Downtown Connector closed in both directions at 10th Street. JOHN SPINK / JSPINK@AJC.COM
5 / 7
A tanker truck crash and chemical spill has the Downtown Connector closed in both directions at 10th Street. JOHN SPINK / JSPINK@AJC.COM
